short_summary: One (1) complete Tire Changer Machine and one (1) complete Wheel Balancer.
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for one (1) complete Tire Changer Machine and one (1) complete Wheel Balancer. The Contractor must supply, deliver, assemble, test and provide training for the Tire Changer and Wheel Balancer as listed in this Annex Statement of Requirement.

full_summary:
# **Government Tender Announcement**

## **Bid Opportunity Notice**

### **Tender Title**

**W0133-24T041**

* **English Title:** One (1) Complete Tire Changer Machine and one (1) Complete Wheel Balancer
* **French Title:** Une (1) machine à changer les pneus complète et une (1) équilibreuse de roues complète

### **Tender Details**

* **Solicitation Number:** WS4209932453
* **Reference Number:** WS4209932453 Doc4291315581
* **Amendment Number:** 0
* **Publication Date:** November 3, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** December 6, 2023 @ 2:00 PM
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** N/A
* **Expected Contract End Date:** March 29, 2025

### **Tender Status**

This tender opportunity has expired.

### **Goods and Services**

The tender requires the supply, delivery, assembly, testing, and training for one (1) complete tire changer machine and one (1) complete wheel balancer.

### **Procurement Category**

* **English Category:** Goods
* **French Category:** Marchandises

### **Procurement Type**

* **English Type:** Request for Proposal
* **French Type:** Demande de propositions

### **Procurement Method**

* **English Method:** Competitive – Open bidding
* **French Method:** Concurrentielle – Invitation ouverte à soumissionner

### **Contact Information**

* **Name:** Darlene Thorne (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email:** [darlene.thorne@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:darlene.thorne@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Notice URL:** [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17913054?extsite=MTc5MTMwNTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17913054?extsite=MTc5MTMwNTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
